name: Anglesey Winter Fair

location.address: Jones Bros Pavilion and Cadarn Hall, Anglesey Showground, Gwalchmai, Holyhead LL65 4RW

description: The Anglesey Winter Fair celebrates 31 years of bringing farmers, local businesses, and the wider community together in the weeks leading up to Christmas. Held entirely indoors within purpose-built, heated exhibition halls at the Anglesey Showground, this beloved event ensures comfort and accessibility rain or shine. The two-day fair showcases the best of Welsh rural life with livestock competitions featuring sheep, cattle, and horses, alongside produce shows, cookery, crafts, floral displays, and photography competitions. The welcoming, family-friendly atmosphere makes it a unique opportunity to experience authentic Welsh agricultural heritage, support local producers, and find wonderful artisan gifts perfect for the festive season.
